source.9574bd0e:
df_men = data.loc[data['Sex'] == 'Male']
x = df_men['Kind of sex and eye contact']

df_women = data.loc[data['Sex'] == 'Female']
y = df_women['Kind of sex and eye contact']
source.33d9b477:
plt.figure(figsize=(12,6))
plt.hist(x, bins=np.arange(8)-0.7, rwidth=0.4, color='blue', label='men', ec='black')
plt.hist(y, bins=np.arange(8)-0.3, rwidth=0.4, color='pink', label='women', ec='black')
plt.legend()
plt.title('Kind of sex and eye contact')
plt.xticks(rotation=90)
plt.show()

source.227991eb:
df_ele = data.loc[data['Education'] == 'Elementary']
x = df_ele['Do you engage in oral sex?']

df_appr = data.loc[data['Education'] == 'Apprenticeship']
y = df_appr['Do you engage in oral sex?']

df_sec = data.loc[data['Education'] == 'Secondary']
z = df_sec['Do you engage in oral sex?']

df_uni = data.loc[data['Education'] == 'University']
w = df_uni['Do you engage in oral sex?']
source.9da15fbb:
plt.figure(figsize=(12,6))
plt.hist(x, bins=np.arange(12)-0.8, rwidth=0.5, color='blue', ec='black',label='Elementary')
plt.hist(y, bins=np.arange(12)-0.2, rwidth=0.5, color='green', ec='black', label='Apprenticeship')
plt.hist(z, bins=np.arange(12)-0.4, rwidth=0.5, color='red', ec='black',label='Secondary')
plt.hist(w, bins=np.arange(12)-0.1, rwidth=0.5, color='pink', ec='black', label='University')

plt.legend()
plt.title('Do you engage in oral sex?')
plt.xticks(rotation=90)
plt.show()

source.142418d8:
Sexy Elephant (Růžový Slon in Czech) is one of the leading online retailers of sex toys in the Czech Republic. The company is well-known for its unconventional and innovative approach to selling sex toys, shooting its own product videos, and a large database of product reviews. Learn more at https://www.ruzovyslon.cz/ or https://www.ruzovyslon.sk/ (only in Czech and Slovak, respectively).

Sexy Elephant commissioned an oral-sex-focused questionnaire survey on a representative sample (n=1100) of the Czech's online population in the age range 18-65. The survey was conducted by an international market research agency.
source.3d068ee2: #### Do you engage in oral sex?
source.2da1d004:
## Conclusion 2
From the analysis of survey we can say that for almost maximum polulation who studied as  in czech republic as Apprenticeship, secondary responded yes in oral sex. We can also see approx same population involved in initiation of oral sex, however there is a hike in secondary one in initiation as compared to other education for oral sex. Also we can also see most population agree eye contact is necessary in vaginal sex

source.d068b2eb: ## Oral sex on its prevalence, similar sex practices, etc. in Czech population aged 18-65
source.8663c235: #### Kind of sex and eye contact genderwise
source.1bec7be5:
## Conclusion 1
From the analysis of survey we can say that for almost 80 percent of polulation in czech republic responded yes in oral sex. We can see both gender involved in initiation of oral sex, however there is a hike in male initiation as compared to Female for oral sex. Also we can also see almost both population agree eye contact is necessary in vaginal sex
